subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With an overflow crowd in the right-field stands on its feet and chanting “Let’s go, Papi!” Ortiz reached the milestone when he lined a shot to right-center to lead off the fifth inning.
snippet: With an overflow crowd in the right-field stands on its feet and chanting “Let’s go, Papi!” Ortiz reached the milestone when he lined a shot to right-center to lead off the fifth inning.
